titles.title: Saudi Arabia December 6, 2019, Anti-Terror and Accountability Act
Saudi Arabia December 6, 2019, Anti-Terror and Accountability Act
To take certain actions with respect to Saudi Arabia in response to the shootings that occurred at Naval Air Station Pensacola in Florida on December 6, 2019.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Foreign Affairs, and Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
